description:
A new student moves into Laura`s school, but she`s no ordinary person. She happens to be a celebrity singer named Glitter and she`s anything but nice when she tries to steal Laura`s crush Travis away from her. At the same time, Glitter`s hamster Sparkle meets Hamtaro and his fellow Hams. 
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: とっとこアイドル! くるりんちゃん
